title: In Chang-soo
text:
In Chang-soo (; born 23 November 1972) is a former South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>er and coach. He holds Argentine citizenship.
In was born in South Korea. When he was a child, he emigrated to Argentina. His Argentine name is Diego.
Club career.
In Chang-soo played for <a href="E-Land%20Puma%20FC">E-Land Puma</a> during 1994 and 1995.
Managerial career.
In 2006, he started his coaching career in <a href="Goyang%20Zaicro%20FC">Ansan Hallelujah</a>.
On 5 December 2017, he was appointed as manager of <a href="Seoul%20E-Land%20FC">Seoul E-Land</a>.
In 2019, In was appointed as assistant manager of <a href="South%20Korea%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">South Korea under-20</a> team. With them, he was the runner-up at the <a href="2019%20FIFA%20U-20%20World%20Cup">2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup</a>.
